Author: crydontsmile
Text: I’m majorly in the same boat - I’ve been fasting for around 2 days (50+ hours now) and was planning to break it this morning since I have school, but can’t battle the nagging little voice that tells me to just push through for another day. I think it’s best to start with something small and healthy, or even just a drink you wouldn’t usually have during a fast! (Like for me, I’m thinking of a meal replacement shake!) And just remind yourself during that time that you do have to eat at some point, and it is definitely okay to eat after fasting for any extended period of time, and just keep reminding yourself to try and push back that little voice that won’t be having a bar of it.

Author: PoorLama
Text: Start small, like tea with sugar and milk to break the fast. I find that helps the negative thoughts from being overwhelming so you can eat more substantially later on.
